project.name: ${projectName} Core
project.dependencies:
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.caconfig.api compile
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.caconfig.impl test
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.models.api compile
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.models.impl test
#if ( $optionWcmioHandler == "y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.sling.models compile
io.wcm io.wcm.sling.commons compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.commons compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.url compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.link compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.media compile
io.wcm io.wcm.handler.richtext compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.commons compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.parsys compile
io.wcm io.wcm.wcm.ui.granite compile
#end
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.aem-mock test
#if( $optionAemVersion == "6.1" )
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.testing.osgi-mock test
#end
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.testing.logging-mock test
org.apache.sling org.apache.sling.testing.caconfig-mock-plugin test
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.caconfig test
#if ( $optionWcmioHandler == "y" )
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.sling test
io.wcm io.wcm.testing.wcm-io-mock.handler test
#end
org.osgi osgi.core compile
org.osgi osgi.cmpn compile
com.adobe.aem uber-jar apis compile
#if( $optionAemVersion != "6.1" && $optionAemVersion != "6.2" )
com.adobe.cq core.wcm.components.core compile
#end

build.plugins:
io.wcm.devops.maven.plugins eclipse-maven-plugin
false
org.apache.felix maven-bundle-plugin
#if ( $optionMultiBundleLayout == "y" ) SLING-INF/app-root;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=xml;path:=/apps/${projectName}/core, SLING-INF/app-i18n;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=json;path:=/apps/${projectName}/core/i18n, SLING-INF/app-config;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=xml;path:=/apps/${projectName}/config #else SLING-INF/app-root;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=xml;path:=/apps/${projectName}, SLING-INF/app-i18n;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=json;path:=/apps/${projectName}/i18n, SLING-INF/clientlibs-root;overwrite:=true;ignoreImportProviders:=xml;path:=/etc/clientlibs/${projectName} #end
## Sling-Model-Package is no longer required since Sling Models Impl 1.3.4/AEM 6.3 with bnd plugin enabled #if( $optionAemVersion == "6.1" || $optionAemVersion == "6.2" )
${package}
#end
^/content/(dam/)?${projectName}(/.*)?$
#if ( $optionMultiBundleLayout != "y" )
org.codehaus.mojo build-helper-maven-plugin
add-resource
process-resources
src/main/webapp SLING-INF true
clientlibs-root/*.json
#end
